subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Male — Fastigium of vertex moderately wide, anterior margin of pronotum concave, posterior margin rounded. Prosternum bispinose, macropterous, forewing pigmented with comparatively large dark spots; no marking in costal and percostal area, cross veins of costal and perocostal area of forewings irregular to almost regular. Stridulatory file area of male left tegmen large, stridulatory file elevated on thickened vein, slightly rounded, about 52 large and 28 small teeth with main teeth very robust, which are large and spaced in the middle, gradually becoming narrower towards the apex. Hind femora unarmed ventrally. Tibia marked with spot towards base, dark on mid tibia, often faint on other. Hind tibiae with 6 apical spurs. Tenth tergite slightly broad, basal margin arched, concave, posterior margin with a pair of obtuse lobes. Cerci conical with spines in middle and at the apex small spine-like projection. Subgenital plate long with middle carinae, posterior margin incision in the middle; styli long, cylindrical, apices obtuse.

Female: Tenth abdominal tergite small, incision in middle with apical margins rounded. Epiproct small, triangular, rounded with apex obtuse. Cerci conical at base, suddenly narrowing, apex obtuse, hirsute. Subgenital plate slightly broader anteriorly and posterior narrowing posteriorly, flat, apical lobe slightly rounded. Ovipositor moderately straight and slightly curved upward, dorsal and ventral margins smooth, dorsal valve longer than ventral.
Distribution. India : Rajasthan; Karnataka; Kerala; Meghalaya; Madhya Pradesh; Gujarat; Maharashtra.
